doc.field: Records of the Office of the Chancellor
Records of the Office of the Chancellor

Correspondence including a letter to Faculty on behalf of M. Daniel E. Megio (?) from W. Belden, from W. Belden Jr., Auley?, and C.S. Conkling; letter from Doumas (son of Robert Ogden) to Rev. C. Mason; letter to Ferris from the friends of David Crawford; letter from G.F. Bacon to Chancellor Mathews; letter from E.D. Smith to Ferris; letter from Ferris to Vermilye; and a letter to R.B. Palton, the Librarian. Also included are particulars of the Chinese curiosities and coins; a note to Council; printed notice of professors' fees; and miscellaneous notes of salaries and fees

Correspondence including a letter to Faculty on behalf of M. Daniel E. Megio (?) from W. Belden, from W. Belden Jr., Auley?, and C.S. Conkling; letter from Doumas (son of Robert Ogden) to Rev. C. Mason; letter to Ferris from the friends of David Crawford; letter from G.F. Bacon to Chancellor Mathews; letter from E.D. Smith to Ferris; letter from Ferris to Vermilye; and a letter to R.B. Palton, the Librarian. Also included are particulars of the Chinese curiosities and coins; a note to Council; printed notice of professors' fees; and miscellaneous notes of salaries and fees
Records of the Office of the Chancellor

Series I >> Correspondence including a letter to Faculty on behalf of M. Daniel E. Megio (?) from W. Belden, from W. Belden Jr., Auley?, and C.S. Conkling; letter from Doumas (son of Robert Ogden) to Rev. C. Mason; letter to Ferris from the friends of David Crawford; letter from G.F. Bacon to Chancellor Mathews; letter from E.D. Smith to Ferris; letter from Ferris to Vermilye; and a letter to R.B. Palton, the Librarian. Also included are particulars of the Chinese curiosities and coins; a note to Council; printed notice of professors' fees; and miscellaneous notes of salaries and fees

Mason; letter to Ferris from the friends of David Crawford; letter from G.F. Bacon to Chancellor Mathews; letter from E.D. Smith to Ferris; letter from Ferris to Vermilye; and a letter to R.B.
